trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: A rögzített szabványos végpontot <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref> kötést, amely automatikusan felveszi a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when you are writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service that is called from an ASP.NET AJAX application.
trans-unit.target: Használni ezt a végpontot, amikor ír egy [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] szolgáltatás, amely egy ASP.NET AJAX-alkalmazás neve.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> a megadott <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> osztály

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> megadott <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>és <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> osztály
